Reviews.Content: fantastic little hotelwe loved hope return november 2011 roberto miguel carla staff amazing gratitude met gracias locationgreat steps 5th av cross 5th head beach valuethere 2 plans pick regular price night night plus optional plan included breakfast 2 people beach club didnt plan stayed solo option bedroom itonly drawback stay late watching activity streets lovely balcony overlooking calle 4 theres smallish bathroom toilet shower window sink bedroom bathroom theres little dressing sorts bookcase clothes safe bed wall bench nice spacious super clean andit tv onei dont watch tv vacation sleep nice king size bed lots pillows theres roof terrace nice views

Reviews.Title: “Once Again We Loved Our Stay At Hotel Cielo”
Reviews.Author: cigarman25
Reviews.Content: wife stayed hotel cielo ago absolutely loved planning trip october researched hotels figured try else liked cielo time tell stay time james russell staff attentive genuinely stay hotel daily excursions dont tourist trap ie xcarat theme parks steered direction time local flavor treated hotel

Reviews.Title: “Location, value and friendly service”
Reviews.Author: Mugatu77
Reviews.Content: hotel cielo exceeded expectation stay playa del carmen location absolutely perfect block beach beautiful views available balconies decorated comfortable space roof parties private dinners enjoy view cozumel sparkling distance staff friendly courteous stay comfortable worry free prices amazing wonderful hotel middle action wait stay hotel cielo

Reviews.Title: “the hotel with the true flavor of Mexico”
Reviews.Author: DonnaWaukegan
Reviews.Content: loved decor hotel balcony overlooking streets happening funthe staff simply amazingvery helpfuland willing whatever completely safe secure herewe dined bit carboncitos attached hotel cielo food wonderful nicely priced staff bei look forward visit playa staying hotel

Reviews.Title: “Feels like home”
Reviews.Author: Magickfeet
Reviews.Content: traveled husband 18 daughter loved time beautiful little hotel cielo clean bright comfortable staff genuinely bright people whom thoroughly enjoyed talking laughing helpful offered insight fun exploration restaurant provided yummy breakfast coffee morning food lunches dinners location perfect central close beach loved resort experience personal setting exactly family definitely return hotel cielo

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Cielo cares about the people who stay there.”
Reviews.Author: abicus07
Reviews.Content: loved stay hotel cielo location fantastic close bus goes cancun airport hotel located midst action playa del carmen playa walking distance restaurant door phenomenal discount food staying hotel inexpensive boost sick staff care family arranged doctor brought chicken noodle soup brought medicine comforting foreign country looked aboveandbeyond definitely recommend hotel cielo stay visit playa del carmen

Reviews.Title: “HIDDEN GEM!- 30 steps to the beach, best mexican food in Playa”
Reviews.Author: discodollydiva
Reviews.Content: excellent excellent excellent food restaurant below hotel playa taste quality price plus 10 discount lunch dinner fiance originally booked 4 nights hotel loved stayed 4 days hotel 5 steps 5th street 30 steps beach stayed property nice clean comfortable acs excellent bargain playa cable tv free wireless internet free breakfast choice french toast huevos rancheros etc etc included staff friendlyespecially morning cook looking budget holiday stay location cant beat steps multiple dive shops car rental mexican souvenier stands beach 10 minutes walk walmart taxi hotel fantastic reviews correct reccomending cute hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great home base to enjoy Playa del Carmen”
Reviews.Author: birchmark
Reviews.Content: wife stayed hotel cielo 2010 online looked quaint boutique hotel middle action playa del carmen found staff helpful friendly breakfast included stay excellent location added experience half block strip block half beach easy access economical price allowed budget advantage restaurants tours etc beach worth trip recommend hotel looking americanized resort instead authentic clean safe affordable location

Reviews.Title: “Shock and Awe!”
Reviews.Author: NY_Candygram
Reviews.Content: arrived hotel cielo spend 3 nights spent 5 days isla mujeres checkin andrea promised fortunes change understatement stay researched hotel prior choosing werent prepared reality cielo images internet stunning justice entering blown sheer beauty surroundings spanish hacienda pages national geographic real wood windows double wooden french doors balcony furnished comfy chairs flowering plants below carboncitos friendly staff eager satisfy hunger quench thirst learned hard stores playa prohibited selling wine liquor hour sunday restaurants adrian guided wonderful bottle chardonnay spent evening balcony staff eager help dozens questions constantly inquired wellbeing meet russell graciously interrupted own dinner greet spoke volumes character management staff recounted events occurred time height swine flu scare hotels restaurants laying employees closing altogether retained entire staff dipping personal savings previous trips riviera maya weve stayed allinclusives guests hotel cielo doubtful stay else cant wait return

Reviews.Title: “Loved it! We will see you again Henry!!!”
Reviews.Author: Deezlr8
Reviews.Content: travelling south cancun playa del carmen looking forward arriving hotel cielo cab dropped 5th avenue stroll packs shops restaurants tourist vendors smack bang middle pdc location perfect playa 1minute walk beach 20 walk shops couldnt else visiting beach town floor balcony overlooking street reception desk comfy bed tele hot shower couldnt comfortable sounds restaurants start quieten midnight getting sleep bright morning restaurant door nice guys road agua forget waiters name sells little pyramid trick food beers served ontop waiters heads adds fun tab hotel cielo absoutely brilliant situated heart playa thanks henry booking time mexico staying cielo

Reviews.Title: “Cute, Cozy, Clean, Cool, Close to everything and 1 block from white sand beaches...”
Reviews.Author: livelarggg
Reviews.Content: waiting book flight hotel returning consistently south cancun hotel cool management cool secure staff makes vacations hotel doesnt look outside offers home vacation inhouse restaurant air conditioning key entry safe cable tv wifi drinking water 8 dollars catch ado bus cancun airport playa blocks cielo roll luggage door food beer cold weather warm 1 block white sand beaches minutes fusion zenzi deep blue dont forget ceviche nachos 5 min walk catch ferry cozumel 350 akumal tulum considered price hotel makes multiple trips throughout

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Place to Stay-Best Bang for your Buck”
Reviews.Author: cudabob
Reviews.Content: spent week feb 2010 time 11 clean 2 balconies ocean views staff helpful friendly especially henry manager andrea ana restaurant spoke english directions whatsoever accomodations block beautiful swimmable beach middle 5th ave attached restaurant carboncitos fantastic especially mojitos pumpkin seed salsa tacos el pastor reasonable prices food owner russell days hi heading playa thanks henry

Reviews.Content: trip culmination trips weve playa del carmen hotel cielo wouldnt beautiful clean bright comfortable else friendly helpful enjoy peace quiet carboncitos eatery downstairs tasty excellent service fun location charm own wont forget time soon thanks

Reviews.Content: met found friend henry hotel cielo playa del carmen helpful guy goes beyond customers witness visitor assistance ticket led ticket agency claudia assisted nice set people family oriented community restaurants seafood eat

Reviews.Title: “Amazing hotel!”
Reviews.Author: travelManiacX
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel cielo 5 nights trip mexico week loved 2 ground floor cheap rate beautiful loved arch design cheap window doesnt lot sunlight cold water tap wasnt day free upgrade 13 floor hotel consider changing internet free wireless available extremely slow kept disconnecting reconnecting wasnt useful henry helpful happy assist advice including excursions local eat staff hotel hotels restaurant wonderful helpful smile breakfast restaurant everyday loved especially mexican eggs eggs delicious complaints hotel wonderful simple hotel excellent location 1 block beach highly recommended cant wait

Reviews.Title: “Simple, charming... perfect for us!!”
Reviews.Author: mz72
Reviews.Content: little gem hotel quaint charming exactly looking location 1 block beach beach hotel balcony perfect proximity restaurants shopping nightlife beach food beer cheap 2 sol course henry fantastic concierge willing answer questions recommendations chitchat kids highly recommend hotel definitely soon

Reviews.Title: “My little piece of Paradise”
Reviews.Author: Squeaker1969
Reviews.Content: stayed 5 times goal try little authentic hotels timeshare carboncitos french toast town staff english speaking skills willing help festive peaceful people safe

Reviews.Title: “Superb Service and Very good Location.”
Reviews.Author: garbuttr
Reviews.Content: hotel offers clean comfortable service staff unquestionable encountered traveling throughout mexico recommend henry concierge questions ready willing help visit hotel time wife enjoyed stay am hotel cielo home home traveling

Reviews.Title: “Best Little Hotel in Playa Del Carmen”
Reviews.Author: diver123alberta
Reviews.Content: little hotel 5th ave strip stayed couple times 6 months trip henry helpfull happen clean staff resturant stairs eat stay else please contact info hot luck enjoy stay alberta canada

Reviews.Title: “Quiet boutique hotel despite right in the middle of action!”
Reviews.Author: juandpurple
Reviews.Content: hotel reviews tripadvisor decided check arrived playa pretty photos website hotels arent nice location fantastic stones throw ado station collectivo tulum receptionists helpful answer questions smile wifi access fantastic minus werent issue ill list matters 1 mattress isnt feel springs sitting lying bed mum sore constant perfume release didnt clothes smell breakfast included basic breakfast weve trip overall positive experience price location consider value

Reviews.Title: “The best place to stay. We got married there.”
Reviews.Author: julijaSlovenia
Reviews.Content: highly recommend hotel cielo kept secrets playa del carmen clean stuff friendly food wanna feel home traveling abroad choose cielo money buy decided married mexico contacted hotel cielo email promised arrange happy reservation mexico staff hotel cielo arranged unforgettable wedding beach bouquet wedding cheese cake restaurant afterwards baby boy surly return beautiful wedding
